RelatedSentence: Of all the commencement speeches being given this year at high schools , colleges and universities across the country , this was the one that got all the attention .

Jill Abramson , the ousted executive editor of the New York Times , delivered the commencement speech today at Wake Forest University in Winston - Salem , N.C. , her first public appearance since she lost her job last week .

Jill Abramson , the ousted executive editor of the New York Times , delivered the commencement speech today at Wake Forest University in Winston - Salem , N.C. , her first public appearance since she lost her job last week .
And she did n't ignore what has become a big controversy for the newspaper .
Valerie Strauss covers education and runs The Answer Sheet blog .
